name: Life Finds a Way (Wizard Jam)
description:
A rouge-a-like-a-like where you take a randomly assembled character through an endless, generated gauntlet, picking up Goldblums to unlock new, better, and goofier body parts to roll in your next character.

Controls:

  • ESC: quit (at any time)
  • ENTER: advance menus
  • arrow keys: move the character
  • R: respin (spin screen, once available)
  • Q: lock head selection (spin screen, once available)
  • A: lock torso selection (spin screen, once available)
  • Z: lock legs selection (spin screen, once available)
